name: URBAN TYPE printed red on white
description:
This listing is for one not-quite-fat quarter of the Urban Type design printed in red on white basecloth.

This design is hand-printed, so each piece is unique. The fabric is a 100% linen. Care instructions included with each order.

The printed area measures approx 13.5 x 17.5 inches or 35 x 45 cm. The cut fabric is a little bit bigger.

Not-quite-fat quarters are ideal for all sorts of smaller projects, features on kids clothes, or for home decor projects.

This design is from the Urban Type Range and is based on prints from my collection of old wooden type blocks. This range is inspired by a graphic designer's love of typography and wooden type.
